A local friend recommended this place and we were so happy to go on our last night in Barcelona as we had had a ton of tapas that were all excellent but similar.  We loved Cuines because they were asian fusion tapas, so we had sushi and spicy noodles along with some Spanish tapas.  The atmosphere is cool and feels very current and fresh.  They don't take reservations so we got there when they opened at 7:00pm and the queue filled the tables.  Our service was efficient and matter of fact.
